metadata.title: CVE-2019-19963 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in wolfSSL before 4.3.0 in a non-default configuration where DSA is enabled. DSA signing uses the BEEA algorithm during modular inversion of the nonce, leading to a side-channel attack against the nonce.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0+dfsg-2').
